Text: Ugh?! Ack... What a heavy blow...!

Agh...! She's attacking without even looking this
way...!

...No preparatory moves... She just attacked...
Delta's sharper...than she used to be.
Have her animal instincts been honed?
Delta! Stop! Why are you doing this?!

Graarrrr! Shut up!!! I'm stronger than you!
Don't order me around!!!

The weak die. The strong kill. That's it! That's all
there is to it!

It seems there's no reasoning with her. We have to
take her down. We'll subdue her by tying her up.

(She's powered up even more, maybe even more than
me—)

I'll kill everyone! If I kill everyone, then I'm the
best! If I'm the best, then Boss man will praise me!

I'll kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill
you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Graaaaaaghhh!!!
That's all the time I can buy you.
